page.title: 09TRADE
page.content: At the end of Heards Lane,behind the Church are situated a warehouse and a packaging company. The buildings consist of a warehouse and 2 portakabin offices. About l4 people are employed in the two businesses.One, A&R Packaging Company has been in business for 10 years.The firm used to strip and re-label cans for multiple grocers. This stopped in 1984 and a system of flowline packaging was begun for the fast food market, disposable products such as individual packs of serviette,knife & fork and condiments. They also handpack items for the Do It Yourself market. The other, the warehousing side is used by an Import/Export company selling a wide range of disposable products and plastic items to dairy, dessert and ice-cream markets.
